definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: stop up, muzzle (NH id., [[חסום]] muzzle; Aram. [[חֲסַם]] bind up fast)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[לאׁ תַחְסׂם שׁוֹר בְּדִישׁוֹ]] De 25:4 thou shalt not muzzle an ox when it is treading (i.e. threshing); Pt. [[וְחׂסֶמֶת היא]] Ez Eze 39:11 and it shall stop (the way of) the passers-by; but rd. [[וְחָֽסְמוּ את־הַגַּיְא]] and they shall stop up the valley, Co v. LXX Syrver Hi.
